Articles.Content:
Alrighty, the objective of this game is to make up any little bit of history you want! If you'd like, you can use factual information about the given day when you post, but you should definitely let your imagination run free!

Take today's date, and any year you choose, and make up something about what happened on this day! For example:

April 19, 1959: Beatles member Ringo Starr was brought to earth by Emperor Zingfreid of the Andromeda Galaxy with the intention of inducing music-based mass mind control. It worked.

Now it's your turn!
April 19, 2077: The entire Milky Way Galaxy was eaten by a gigantic space goat after Earth fired nuclear missles with grass in it at the goat. It caused the universe to implode.

April 19.1, 2014: Super starts a war on the forums that pits Rasheed and super in an all-out war. For no reason.

Edited April 19, 2014 by Souper
April 9.2, 2014: Maximus97, for reasons that are quite obvious, shuts down the war between super and Rasheed. For reasons.
April 9.3, 2014: Rasheed, for no reason, declares war on Maximus97 and super.
April 9.4, 2014: Super teams up with Maximus97 to nuke Rasheed. They are succesful, and Rasheed loses the war.
April 9.5, 2014: A peace treaty is signed by everyone, not allowing further conflict. Until a race of 12 foot long mantis men declare war on THE ENTIRE EARTH.
April 9.6, 2014: Everyone teams up to destroy the mantis men, who came from Zeta Reticuli.
April 19, 2000: This is the day, when, 14 years later, this thread returns to posting about actual history.
April 19, 1961: President Kennedy destroys the Rock invasion fleet with his personal armada of secret nuclear battleships
April 20, 1953: Dr. Jimothy Music discovers pleasing and rhythmic acoustic tones (what we call Music today, in his honor) in his apartment, and uploads a Vine chronicling the event.
